code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import ExpenseForm from'./component/ExpenseForm';import ExpenseTable from'./component/ExpenseTable';import SearchBar from'./component/SearchBar';import Navbar from'./component/Navbar';import'./App.css';import Home from'./component/Home';import Reports from'./component/Reports';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState([]);const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const addExpense=expense=>{setExpenses([...expenses,expense]);};const filteredExpenses=expenses.filter(expense=>expense.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())||expense.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/expenses",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{setSearchTerm:setSearchTerm}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseForm,{addExpense:addExpense}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseTable,{expenses:filteredExpenses})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/reports",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Reports,{})})]})]});};export default App;
